name: ZX Chronicles
description:
An old threat has a rise in Ezon, a world with hopes and dreams threatened by a dark evil. Play as 4 friends in the quest to stop a mastermind from achieving his main goal! Features:

Party System Story Side quests Dungeons Puzzles Bosses Epic Skills
This was my Final year project with my group which I worked really hard on.
It's more then what you would expect an RPG Maker game to be.

Also the game wouldn't get any updates as it is ready for public release (The game was avaliable on Gamejolt a month ago).

There are easter eggs also in the game, but are hard to find. good luck!
